projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Build a modern e-commerce platform with React and Node.js

tasks.title: Set up project structure
tasks.description: Initialize React app and Node.js server with proper folder structure

tasks.title: Design database schema
tasks.description: Create MongoDB models for users, products, orders, and cart

tasks.title: Implement user authentication
tasks.description: Add JWT-based authentication with register, login, and logout

tasks.title: Create product catalog UI
tasks.description: Build product listing page with filters and search

tasks.title: Implement shopping cart
tasks.description: Add cart functionality with add, remove, and update quantities

projects.name: Mobile App Development
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile app using React Native

tasks.title: Setup React Native environment
tasks.description: Install and configure React Native development environment

tasks.title: Design app navigation
tasks.description: Implement navigation structure with React Navigation

tasks.title: Create home screen
tasks.description: Design and implement the main home screen

tasks.title: Add push notifications
tasks.description: Integrate Firebase Cloud Messaging for notifications

tasks.title: Research documentation tools
tasks.description: Evaluate Swagger, Postman, and custom solutions

tasks.title: Write API endpoint documentation
tasks.description: Document all REST API endpoints with examples

tasks.title: Add interactive examples
tasks.description: Create runnable code examples for each endpoint

tasks.title: Deploy documentation site
tasks.description: Host documentation on GitHub Pages or Vercel

comments.text: Great work on the initial setup! The structure looks clean.
Should we use PostgreSQL instead of MongoDB for this?
I've completed the auth implementation. Ready for review.
Need help with the state management. Should we use Redux or Context API?
This feature is blocked by the backend API not being ready yet.
